00072 template <class Graph, class EdgeDiameterMap, class EdgeLengthMap, class VertexPotentialMap >
00073 void compute_vertex_potentials(     const Graph& graph,
00074                                     const typename boost::graph_traits< Graph >::vertex_descriptor s,
00075                                     const typename boost::graph_traits< Graph >::vertex_descriptor t,
00076                                     VertexPotentialMap vertex_potential,
00077                                     const EdgeLengthMap edge_length,
00078                                     const EdgeDiameterMap edge_diameter,
00079                                     const BigFloat desired_precision )  {
00080 
00081     typedef boost::graph_traits< Graph >                    Traits;
00082     typedef typename Traits::vertex_descriptor              vertex_descriptor;
00083     typedef typename Traits::edge_descriptor                edge_descriptor;
00084     typedef typename Traits::vertex_iterator                vertex_iterator;
00085     typedef typename Traits::out_edge_iterator              out_edge_iterator;
00086 
00087     //concept checks
00088     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( boost::GraphConcept< Graph > ));
00089     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( boost::ReadWritePropertyMapConcept< VertexPotentialMap, vertex_descriptor > ));
00090     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( boost::ReadablePropertyMapConcept< EdgeLengthMap, edge_descriptor > ));
00091     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( boost::ReadablePropertyMapConcept< EdgeDiameterMap, edge_descriptor > ));
00092     //Am I missing some other concept?
00093 
00094 
00095 
00096     BigFloat max_diff;
00097 
00098     do {
00099 
00100         max_diff = 0.0;
00101         vertex_iterator v_it, v_it_end;
00102 
00103         for ( boost::tie(v_it, v_it_end) = vertices(graph); v_it != v_it_end; ++v_it) {
00104 
00105                     if ( *v_it == t )
00106                         continue;
00107 
00108                     BigFloat R = 0.0;
00109                     BigFloat S = 0.0;
00110                     out_edge_iterator oe_it, oe_it_end;
00111 
00112                     for ( boost::tie(oe_it, oe_it_end) = out_edges(*v_it, graph); oe_it != oe_it_end; ++oe_it) {
00113 
00114                            vertex_descriptor adjacent = target(*oe_it, graph);
00115                            BigFloat edge_resistance = edge_length[*oe_it] / edge_diameter[*oe_it];
00116 
00117                             if (edge_resistance < desired_precision)
00118                                 continue;
00119 
00120                            R += edge_resistance * vertex_potential[adjacent];
00121                            S += edge_resistance;
00122                     }
00123 
00124 
00125                     if (*v_it == s)
00126                         R += source_strength;
00127 
00128 
00129 
00130                     if ( S < 0.00001 ) {
00131                         continue;
00132 
00133                     } else {
00134 
00135                         BigFloat previous_v_potential = vertex_potential[*v_it];
00136                         vertex_potential[*v_it] = R/S;
00137 
00138                         BigFloat current_diff = std::fabs(vertex_potential[*v_it] - previous_v_potential);
00139 
00140                         if ( current_diff > max_diff )
00141                             max_diff = current_diff;
00142                     }
00143         }
00144 
00145 //            std::cout << max_diff << " < " << desired_precision << "\n";
00146 
00147     } while ( max_diff > desired_precision );
00148 
00149     //postcondition
00150     BOOST_ASSERT( vertex_potential( t ) == 0.0 );
00151     // is vertex_potential( source ) the largest possible potential? If so, there should be an assertion to check for it
00152 
00153 }

00181 template <class Graph, class EdgeDiameterMap, class EdgeLengthMap, class VertexPotentialMap, class EdgeFluxMap >
00182 inline void compute_edge_flux(         const Graph& graph,
00183                                 const VertexPotentialMap vertex_potential,
00184                                 const EdgeLengthMap edge_length,
00185                                 EdgeDiameterMap edge_diameter,
00186                                 EdgeFluxMap edge_flux )  {
00187 
00188 
00189     typedef boost::graph_traits< Graph >                    Traits;
00190     typedef typename Traits::vertex_descriptor              vertex_descriptor;
00191     typedef typename Traits::edge_descriptor                edge_descriptor;
00192     typedef typename Traits::vertex_iterator                vertex_iterator;
00193     typedef typename Traits::edge_iterator                  edge_iterator;
00194     typedef typename Traits::out_edge_iterator              out_edge_iterator;
00195 
00196     //concept checks
00197     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( boost::GraphConcept< Graph > ));
00198     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( boost::ReadablePropertyMapConcept< VertexPotentialMap, vertex_descriptor > ));
00199     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( boost::ReadWritePropertyMapConcept< EdgeFluxMap, edge_descriptor > ));
00200     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( boost::ReadablePropertyMapConcept< EdgeLengthMap, edge_descriptor > ));
00201     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( boost::ReadWritePropertyMapConcept< EdgeDiameterMap, edge_descriptor > ));
00202     //Am I missing some other concept?
00203 
00204     edge_iterator e_it, e_it_end;
00205 
00206     for ( boost::tie(e_it, e_it_end) = edges(graph); e_it != e_it_end; ++e_it) {
00207 
00208         edge_flux[*e_it] = ( edge_length[*e_it] / edge_diameter[*e_it] ) * ( vertex_potential[ source(*e_it, graph) ] - vertex_potential[ target(*e_it, graph) ]  );
00209         edge_diameter[*e_it] = edge_diameter[*e_it] + 0.1 * ( std::fabs(edge_flux[*e_it] - edge_diameter[*e_it]) );
00210 
00211         if ( edge_diameter[*e_it] <= 0.0000001 )
00212             edge_diameter[*e_it] = 0.0;
00213     }
00214 
00215 }

00233 template < typename Graph, typename CurrentPotentialMap, typename PreviousPotentialMap >
00234 void store_current_vertex_potentials(   const Graph& graph,
00235                                         const CurrentPotentialMap current_potential,
00236                                         PreviousPotentialMap previous_potential )   {
00237 
00238     typedef boost::graph_traits< Graph >                    Traits;
00239     typedef typename Traits::vertex_descriptor              vertex_descriptor;
00240     typedef typename Traits::vertex_iterator                vertex_iterator;
00241 
00242     //concept checks
00243     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( boost::GraphConcept< Graph > ));
00244     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( boost::ReadablePropertyMapConcept<CurrentPotentialMap, vertex_descriptor> ));
00245     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( boost::ReadWritePropertyMapConcept<PreviousPotentialMap, vertex_descriptor> ));
00246     //Am I missing some other concept?
00247 
00248     vertex_iterator v_it, v_it_end;
00249 
00250     for (boost::tie(v_it, v_it_end) = vertices(graph); v_it != v_it_end; ++v_it)
00251        previous_potential[*v_it] = current_potential[*v_it];
00252 
00253 }

00277 template < typename Graph, typename CurrentPotentialMap, typename PreviousPotentialMap >
00278 BigFloat calculate_maximal_potential_difference(     const Graph& graph,
00279                                                      const CurrentPotentialMap current_potential,
00280                                                      const PreviousPotentialMap previous_potential)   {
00281 
00282     typedef boost::graph_traits< Graph >                Traits;
00283     typedef typename Traits::vertex_descriptor              vertex_descriptor;
00284     typedef typename Traits::vertex_iterator                vertex_iterator;
00285 
00286     //concept checks
00287     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( boost::GraphConcept< Graph > ));
00288     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( boost::ReadablePropertyMapConcept<CurrentPotentialMap, vertex_descriptor> ));
00289     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( boost::ReadablePropertyMapConcept<PreviousPotentialMap, vertex_descriptor> ));
00290     //Am I missing some other concept?
00291 
00292     BigFloat max_diff = 0.0;
00293     BigFloat current_diff = 0.0;
00294 
00295     vertex_iterator v_it, v_it_end;
00296 
00297     for (boost::tie(v_it, v_it_end) = vertices(graph); v_it != v_it_end; ++v_it) {
00298 
00299       current_diff = std::fabs( previous_potential[*v_it] - current_potential[*v_it]);
00300             if ( current_diff  > max_diff)
00301                     max_diff = current_diff;
00302     }
00303 
00304     return max_diff;
00305 }
